name: Vegetable Minestrone Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 small cauliflower, cut into small florets
440g can four bean mix, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a deep saucepan, gently saut√© the onion to soften. Add the tomato passata and stock.
Bring to the boil, reduce heat and add the prepared diced vegetables, cauliflower, tomatoes, beans and chickpeas.
Simmer for 10 minutes, just prior to serving add the Brussels sprouts and spinach to the hot soup, serve garnished with parsley.
